text: Maze ageze ku mazi (iriba) ya Madiyana, ahasanga abantu benshi buhira (amatungo yabo), inyuma yabo hari abagore babiri bakumira (amatungo yabo kwegera amazi). Aravuga ati “Mufite ikihe kibazo?” Baravuga bati “Ntidushobora gushora (amatungo yacu) abashumba badakutse, kandi data ni umusaza ukuze.”
